# ChefMate - AI Cooking Assistant

## Project Overview
Full-stack cooking helper application using Pydantic AI for intelligent recipe suggestions, ingredient substitutions, and cooking guidance.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 14+ with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui
- Backend: Python FastAPI with Pydantic AI
- AI: OpenRouter (free models)
- Deployment: Vercel
